description: The barber claims they were "too busy" and the staff member trained to cut women's hair was not available.
title: Woman refused cut by St Helier barber 'based on gender'
title_page: Woman refused cut by St Helier barber 'based on gender' - BBC News
maintext: Under Jersey's Discrimination Law 2013, businesses cannot refuse to provide goods or services on the basis of sex, unless "only persons of [a] sex have need of the service" and a joint service for all would be "insufficiently effective".
